question:
What is the error in this JavaScript code?

if (5 > 3) console.log('Yes') else console.log('No');

What is the error in this JavaScript code?

if (false) console.log('A'); else if console.log('B'); else console.log('C');
options: else if cannot be used here

question:
What is the error in this JavaScript code?

if (x = 10) { console.log('Equal'); } else { console.log('Not Equal'); }

What is the error in this JavaScript code?

if ('10' === 10) { console.log('Match'); } else console.log('Mismatch') }
